short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click IP check for network troubleshooting, privacy, and curiosity. Get your public IP and location instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dual IP Info is the perfect Chrome extension to keep tabs on your IP addresses, providing you with both your local and public IP addresses in real-time. With just one click, you can refresh the information to stay up to date. It's not just a monitoring tool but also a handy utility for those concerned about online security or needing to access devices or services remotely.

Key Features:

Real-Time Local and Public IPs: With Dual IP Info, you'll always see your local and public IP addresses right in your browser's toolbar.

Refresh with a Single Click: Easily refresh your IP addresses with just one click to keep them constantly updated.

Store the Last 5 IPs: Dual IP Info remembers the last 5 IP addresses, so you can revisit them whenever you need.

Useful for Secure Browsing: Check your public IP before accessing sensitive websites or services to ensure online security.

With Dual IP Info, you have control over your IP addresses and can take measures to ensure online security. It's a simple yet highly useful extension that puts the information you need right at your fingertips. Download Dual IP Info now and stay in control!
